org.xeroserver.x0library.config

Class ConfigFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xeroserver.x0library.config.ConfigFile

  • public final class ConfigFile
extends java.lang.Object

    A class to load, save and edit simple configuration files with a 'key = value' format.

    Author:
    Daniel 'Xer0' Englisch

    • Method Detail

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        Checks weather this ConfigFile was already saved to disk.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean if the ConfigFile was saved to disk.

      • getProperties

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getProperties()
        Returns a Map of all parsed / existing properties of this ConfigFile.
        Returns:
        Returns a Map of all parsed / existing properties of this ConfigFile.

      • save

        public boolean save()
        Saves the ConfigFile to disk.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean indicating the success of the saving process.

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Clears loaded / added properties from the memory and freshly parses the configuration file on disk. If this ConfigFile wasn't saved before, all properties will be lost!

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the configuration file on disk.
        Returns:
        Returns the name of the configuration file on disk.
